body_html: @printdhruv thank you for being thoughtful! Jenkins tests different platforms, and it's good to check on your end as you do. For other platforms, if you want to go the extra mile, you can try docker. The docker platforms are checked in. But it's fine for us to test the build as long as you tested your main platform.
body_text: @printdhruv thank you for being thoughtful! Jenkins tests different platforms, and it's good to check on your end as you do. For other platforms, if you want to go the extra mile, you can try docker.  The docker platforms are checked in. But it's fine for us to test the build as long as you tested your main platform.
body: @printdhruv thank you for being thoughtful! Jenkins tests different platforms, and it's good to check on your end as you do. For other platforms, if you want to go the extra mile, you can try docker.  The docker platforms are [checked in](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/docker). But it's fine for us to test the build as long as you tested your main platform.
